name: Buckler Up!
description:
Buckler Up! is a game made by Big Green Pillow and Pocket Trap and winner of the Grand Prize of 2015's Indie Speed Run Competition!

It's a fun pong-style, timing based action with lots of fire!
Join Buck, the Buckler Boy™ in his fight against the weird dragons that are creeping his floating petit island with only his magic shield, a bunch of timing and no attack at all! Who needs a sword? Anyway, BUCKLER UP!

Music: Sea Battles in Space by RoccoW
